{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Upcycling {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Upcycling Upcycling , also known as creative reuse , is the process of transforming by-products, waste materials, useless, or unwanted products into new materials or products perceived to be of greater quality, such as artistic value or environmental value. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Upcycling)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
